properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 7 at 4:27AM EST until January 8 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Lakeshore Flood Advisory, which is in effect from 6 PM this
evening to noon CST Wednesday.

* LAKE SHORE FLOODING...West to northwest winds of 20 to 30 mph
with gusts to 35 mph tonight will diminish to 15 to 25 mph by
Wednesday morning. Waves of 6 to 12 feet, occasionally to 15
feet, are expected tonight into Wednesday. Waves subside to 3 to
6 feet by midday Wednesday.

* TIMING...Tonight into Wednesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong west-northwest winds and high wave action
tonight into Wednesday will lead to minor beach erosion and
lakeshore flooding along the immediate lakeshore.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds will
generate flooding of low areas along the lakeshore.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY
